definition: simple harmonic (motion, oscillation etc in mechanics)
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
simple harmonic motion (in mechanics)/motion of a simple pendulum

sentences.english: The first order non-simple harmonic coefficient enhances modulus.
sentences.chinese: 第一非簡諧係數的存在使彈性模量增大。

sentences.english: The system executes simple harmonic motion .
The field of a harmonic point source in layered media has certain angular distribution.
sentences.chinese: 分層介質中簡諧點源的聲場具有確定的角度分佈。

sentences.english: Simple harmonic motion, Amplitude, Period and frequency, Phase;
sentences.chinese: 簡諧運動，振幅，週期和頻率，相位。

sentences.english: The identification principle of simple harmonic excitation method is illustrated.
sentences.chinese: 該文闡明瞭簡諧激振法的識別原理。

sentences.english: This paper discusses general forms of the energy of simple harmonic oscillations.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論關於簡諧振動能量的普遍形式。
